publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4585 Eleanor Scott: PURE Hydrogen—That the Parliament commends the PURE project for its ground-breaking work to prove that renewable hydrogen and fuel cells are viable; believes that the partnership between PURE’s renewable hydrogen and siGen’s innovative hydrogen car is an inspiring demonstration of the future of environmentally sustainable transport; appreciates the enterprise and leadership shown by the Unst community in running the PURE project, and urges the Scottish Executive to increase its support for innovation towards a hydrogen economy in Scotland. Supported by: Richard Lochhead*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Robin Harper*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Patrick Harvie*, Alex Neil*, Rob Gibson*, Maureen Macmillan*, Bruce Crawford*
S2M-4585 PURE Hydrogen (lodged on 20 June 2006) Tommy Sheridan*, Mike Pringle*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Chris Ballance*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-4585 PURE Hydrogen (lodged on 20 June 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Shiona Baird*

S2M-4585 Eleanor Scott: PURE Hydrogen—That the Parliament commends the PURE project for its ground-breaking work to prove that renewable hydrogen and fuel cells are viable; believes that the partnership between PURE’s renewable hydrogen and siGen’s innovative hydrogen car is an inspiring demonstration of the future of environmentally sustainable transport; appreciates the enterprise and leadership shown by the Unst community in running the PURE project, and urges the Scottish Executive to increase its support for innovation towards a hydrogen economy in Scotland. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Mr Mark Ruskell, Robin Harper, Mr Adam Ingram, Patrick Harvie, Alex Neil, Rob Gibson, Maureen Macmillan, Bruce Crawford, Tommy Sheridan, Mike Pringle, Mr Andrew Arbuckle, Chris Ballance, Mr Jim Wallace, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Donald Gorrie, Shiona Baird
S2M-4585 PURE Hydrogen (lodged on 20 June 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4585 PURE Hydrogen (lodged on 20 June 2006) Susan Deacon*, Linda Fabiani*
S2M-4585 PURE Hydrogen (lodged on 20 June 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*
